blackengine.gameLogic.components.prefab.behaviour

Class Behaviour

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackengine.gameLogic.components.prefab.behaviour.Behaviour
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IntervalBehaviour, RepeatingBehaviour

    public class Behaviour
extends java.lang.Object
    An instance of this class represents a behavioural function that will be called by the parent BehaviourComponent on its parent entity.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Behaviour(java.lang.String name, java.util.function.Consumer<Entity> consumer, long delay, float priority)
      Default protected constructor for creating a new instance of Behaviour.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Behaviour

        protected Behaviour(java.lang.String name,
                    java.util.function.Consumer<Entity> consumer,
                    long delay,
                    float priority)
        Default protected constructor for creating a new instance of Behaviour.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the behaviour.
        consumer - The consumer that will be called each successful tick.
        delay - The delay before the first successful tick should happen.
        priority - The priority of this behaviour.

    • Method Detail

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Flags this behaviour for destruction. It will be removed from the parent BehaviourComponent in the next update cycle.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Getter for the name of this behaviour.
        Returns:
        A String representing the name of this behaviour.

      • getConsumer

        protected java.util.function.Consumer<Entity> getConsumer()
        Getter for the consumer of this behaviour.
        Returns:
        An instance of Consumer%ltEntity%gt.

      • getDelay

        protected long getDelay()

      • isDestroyed

        public boolean isDestroyed()
        Getter for the destruction flag of this behaviour.
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating whether the behaviour should be destroyed by its parent BehaviourComponent on next update cycle. True if it should be destroyed, false otherwise.

      • setEntity

        public void setEntity(Entity entity)
        Setter for the Entity reference for this behaviour.
        Parameters:
        entity - An instance of Entity.

      • getPriority

        public float getPriority()
        Getter for the priority of this behaviour. A higher priority means the behaviour will be called before other behaviours in the parent BehaviourComponent update cycle.
        Returns:
        A float representing the priority of this behaviour.

      • tick

        public boolean tick()
        Will call the consumer if the delay has passed. Will return true if the consumer was called, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        A boolean representing whether the consumer was called.

      • as

        public static BehaviourBuilder as(java.lang.String name,
                                  java.util.function.Consumer<Entity> consumer)
        Creates a new behaviour builder. Specify behaviour parameters after this call, like after(delayInMs), every(intervalInMs) or repeating(times). End the build by calling build().
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the behaviour that will be built.
        consumer - The consumer that will be called each successful tick.
        Returns:

      • clone

        public Behaviour clone()
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object
